definition: category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: So this one happens to begin with a sort of dominant chord.
sentences.chinese: 所以這段是從某種屬音和絃開始的。

sentences.english: So that's our dominant preparation and then the melody starts, so let's listen to this.
sentences.chinese: 到此屬音準備結束，旋律開始，我們來聽一下。

sentences.english: So this is a little bit of dominant preparation.
sentences.chinese: 那麼這就是一點屬音的準備。

sentences.english: The other one's probably going to be the dominant.
So if you hear two chords rocking, it's probably tonic and dominant.
sentences.chinese: 如果你聽到有兩個和絃，這有可能是主音和屬音。

sentences.english: Just dominant time, going faster and faster, and then what happens?
sentences.chinese: 只是屬音拍子，越來越快，然後怎麼了呢？
